attributes.title: Worst App In History
attributes.review: This is literally the worst app ever, when I finished downloading the app weird stuff started happening to my phone and I believe it’s Trumps fault 🌝but anyways this is the worst app anyone could have. It will ruin your phone and don’t support trump it will ruin your life. If your a trump supporter get tf out my review🤗and get a life that’s all I have to say ✨🧚🏼💫

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review:
i opened the app and it tried to convince me that vaccines are safe.  how dare this app tell me that vaccines dont cause autism.  all the children i know with autism were vaccinated so obviously all the heavy metals in the vaccine they got as a baby caused it.  not to mention that essential oils are much more effective.  ive even heard that injecting bleach can work too.  

very disappointed.

attributes.title: STOLEN FISH #RIPLARRY😤😒😳🤢
attributes.review: this app STOLE MY PET FISH ! i dont know how it happened but i bought a fish last month and named it 🌸 Larry 🌸. he was the BEST fish i have EVER had! we took walks together, went shopping, had picnics, went on adventures! Everything went DOWNHILL once i downloaded this app to see what trump had to say about being reelected. AFTER I DOWNLOADED THE APP SUDDENLY MY FISH DISAPPEARED! #riplarry 😒😒😤this app is terrible i want my fish back!

attributes.title: terribles service
attributes.review:
really wanted to see her anger level and how we can switch his mind using this service application. However, the service given was not available as advertised in his campaigns. I personally since the fall of his recent campaign things went down hill. Thank you
I am a member of Gen Z and I approve this message. ;)

attributes.title: Worst/scariest app ever
attributes.review: I downloaded thinking I’d get to see pictures of dt getting spray tanned and instead, Jeffrey Epstein showed up in my room and kept asking me to rub his feet. Being a man, I was confused but I knew I could get $200 if I did it so I went through with it and donated the $200 to Black Lives Matter. Then Ghislaine showed up so this app is forcing me to commit felonies.

attributes.title: Horrible!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: wow. i had high hopes for this app. it took SO LONG to download & once it did it barely worked. it glitches every minute, & it kept kicking me out. it was super slow when it wasn’t glitching. this app made my whole phone work slower, even after i deleted it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD, it will make your entire phone glitch out!!!!!

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: The layout and user friendly experience is terrible. Blocky and chunky layout with the color scheme and feel that a 4 year old made it. I honestly felt childish when I used the app. I think the Trump administration needs to learn a thing or two about designing and structure before they embarrass themselves with such a bad app again. Sko tik tok

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app about a week ago, and yes I do regret it. Ever since opening it for the first time my life is in shambles. My boyfriend and I of 6 years broke up, my parents divorced, and my brother lost his job. We’ve also heard ghost in the house screaming Trump 2020. Please do not download this app unless you want your life to be in a ruin afterwards.

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: DO NOT download this app. my phone would crash every time i would open the app and then freeze for hours at a time. the app glitches in and out of tabs and virus notifications kept popping up only when i downloaded it and when you delete it they stopped. not worth ruining ur your phone!!!

attributes.title: rest in peace✨🌸🌸🧚✨
attributes.review: i got this app to check on the lovely ✨cheeto✨ man. unfortunately the app KILLED MY MOTHER. yes. it killed my mother. she went into shock because of how AWFUL this app is. i DEMAND trump pays for the funeral ✨🧚😔😔 the app smells like rotten cheese and underarm sweat. cancel this app. i will be reporting it to cancel twitter. my mother deserves better then this. cheeto, you better see this and pay for my moms funeral or else i’m SUING the WHITE HOUSE. good day ☺️🧚✨🧚🌸
